addr: 189 The Grove Drive Los Angeles, CA 90036
title: Mommy&Daughter Holiday Lunch
desc: Please join Kristin and I for our annual Holiday Lunch at American Girl Cafe at the Groove Los Angeles. The cost of the lunch is $25 a person it includes a delicious meal, drink, dessert and cookie for all attendees. You pay the day of the event! It should be a lot of fun! Girls are encouarged to be girls and have fun:)
